bibl.title: The Early Greek Poets: Some Interpretations.
bibl.note: 1. Archilochus, Fr. 3 W. - 2. Archilochus Fr. 13, 5-7 W. - 3. Semonides Fr. 1. 1-7. - 4. Semonides Fr. 7, 41-42. - 5. Semonides Fr. 7, 94-118. - 6. Sappho Fr. 96, 6-9 L.-P. - 7. Sappho Fr. 111 L.-P. - 8. Anacreon Fr. 12, 9-11 P. - 9. Theognis 439-440. - 10. Theognis 1283-1294. - 11. Pindar Fr. Dub. 358 S.-M. - 12. Praxilla Fr. 8 P.
Renehan Robert, The Early Greek Poets: Some Interpretations.
